label: uncl3045
comment: Code specifying the representation of a party name.

values.label: Name components in sequence as defined in description below
values.comment: Name component 1: Family name. Name component 2: Given name or initials. Name component 3: Given name or initials. Name component 4: Maiden name. Name component 5: Title Group of name components transmitted in sequence with name component 1 transmitted first. The maiden name is the family name given at birth of a female. Other names are self-explanatory.

values.label: Name component sequence 2, sequence as defined in description
values.comment: Name component 1: paternal name; name component 2: maternal name; name component 3: given name or initial(s); name component 4: middle name or initial(s); name component 5: name suffix.

values.label: Name components in the sequence as defined in definition
values.comment: Name component 1: Qualification Name component 2: First part of the name Name component 3: Second part of the name.
